ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opsr0.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | opsr0.o | |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) |
| 3 |  | opsr0.t | |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_opsrbas | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` O ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_opsrplusg | |- ( ph -> ( +g ` S ) = ( +g ` O ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` S ) /\ y e. ( Base ` S ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` O ) y ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_grpidpropd | |- ( ph -> ( 0g ` S ) = ( 0g ` O ) ) |
